item.title: GitOps - Argo CD
item.description: Argo CD is a declarative, GitOps continuous delivery tool for Kubernetes. GitOps itself uses Git pull request to manager infrastructure and application configuration.

item.title: Red Hat Quay Registry - Overview and Installation
item.description:
Red Hat Quay is an enterprise-quality container registry, which is responsible to build, scan, store and deploy containers. The main features of Quay include:

  • High Availability

  • Security Scanning (with Clair)

  • Registry mirroring

  • Docker v2

  • Continuous integration

and much more.

item.title: OpenShift Pipelines - Tekton Introduction
item.description: OpenShift Pipelines is a cloud-native, continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD) solution for building pipelines using Tekton. Tekton is a flexible, Kubernetes-native, open-source CI/CD framework that enables automating deployments across multiple platforms (Kubernetes, serverless, VMs, etc) by abstracting away the underlying details.
